name: Seal the Deal (jackxuanliu, Freeeeeg, T9065, Minniii, 3WR, mangomaniac, SanPasht, paperTechnician)
name_original: Seal the Deal (jackxuanliu, Freeeeeg, T9065, Minniii, 3WR, mangomaniac, SanPasht, paperTechnician)
description:
A dice-based tower defense game! Place down seals to defend your colony. Then, roll dice to trigger their effects. You can roll more dice at once, but it'll cost you - so choose carefully between building up your defenses/resources and rolling more dice to make your seals fight harder. Enemies only move when rolling, so feel free to stop and examine your situation when deciding your next move!

If you experience a black screen bug, press the full screen button to fix it.

Thanks for playing!

Programming - Jack Liu, Tony Liu, Zach Piedad, Casey Stanford

Art - Selina Gong, Urika Tandiono

Audio - Eric Gong, San Pashtoon, Euan Tandiono
